Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by New York (N) in 2006...
Traded from New York (N) to Milwaukee on 7/3/2006 (Going to MIL: P R. Stone, SS S. Castro, 3B K. Youkilis, LF C. Floyd, LF M. Gibson. Going to NYN: 3B D. Lamb, LF J. Bay)...
Injured on 4/13/2009 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 7/31/2009, off Philip Humber (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/17/2009, off Daniel Bard (CIN)...
Injured on 8/15/2010 with a Inflamed Bicep Tendon, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 9/17/2011 with a Tender Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Third Base in 2011...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/2/2012, hitting .478 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Traded from Milwaukee to Tampa Bay on 7/8/2012 (Going to TB: 3B S. Castro, P M. Purke. Going to MIL: CF C. Rasmus)...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/2013, hitting .522 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Injured on 9/21/2015 with a Broken Hand, out for 6 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Toronto on 4/22/2016...
Traded from Tampa Bay to Chicago (A) on 2/12/2018 (Going to TB: P C. Sawyer. Going to CHA: 3B S. Castro)...
Injured on 7/31/2018 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/3/2019 to a 4-year deal worth $4,200,000 per year...
Traded from Oakland to Baltimore on 2/16/2020 (Going to OAK: SS C. Sala, P T. Carter. Going to BAL: SS S. Castro, CF K. Williams Jr.)...
Injured on 9/6/2021 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Traded from Baltimore to Philadelphia on 7/31/2022 (Going to PHI: SS S. Castro. Going to BAL: P G. Kemmerer, P A. Dunkelberger)...
